title: Bosch Benchmark Induction Cooktop: Flexibility Meets Efficiency
description:
The Bosch Benchmark Induction Cooktop is designed to create a more streamlined cooking experience. With the FlexInduction setting you can combine two cooking zones into one continuous surface – making it easier to prepare your favorite healthy recipes. Plus, induction cooking can be faster than traditional gas and electric, and can help prevent heat loss.

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Bosch Appliances. Shop for Bosch Benchmark Series Induction Cooktops as well as the full line of Bosch Appliances at Abt today!
